|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = DNUA-145 |manuf_rev = .0GA |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 05/27/2013 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00KUSJUC6 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B00F97M59S |asin_country2 = GB |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "48DNUA45.0GA" and "2013/05/27" is silkscreened on the module board. {{see also|Sky Wireless Connector (SC201)|Wistron NeWeb}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.skyuser.co.uk/forum/sky-demand/54071-new-sky-wireless-mini-connector-internal-component-pictures-sd501.html ''Sky Wireless Connector MINI (SD501)'' on '''SkyUser'''] ([http://www.skyuser.co.uk/forum/attachments/sky-demand/4593d1379419099-new-sky-wireless-mini-connector-internal-component-pictures-sd501-img_0062-1-.jpg images]) *[https://www.linearthoughts.co.uk/sky-sd501-on-demand-connector-review/ ''Sky Wireless Connector MINI (SD501)'' Review on '''LinearThoughts'''] *[https://chrisnharvey.com/hacking-the-sky-wireless-connector/ ''Hacking the Sky Wireless Connector'' on '''Chris Harvey'''] :URL: httр://169.254.xx.xx/ Username: admin Password: sky :WebUI: http://skywirelessconnector.local/login.html

# echo "27d5 0080" > /sys/bus/usb/drivers/ath6kl_usb/new_id
 *[https://www.reddit.com/r/raspberry_pi/comments/6j7hlf/how_to_get_a_dnuabs1_wifi_module_to_work_with_a/ ''Connect to 5-pin WiFi board DNUA-BS1 from Sky+ HD Box?'' on '''Reddit'''] :[[Wistron NeWeb DNUA-BS1]] (27d5:0001) - ''Sky WiFi Module'' ([https://i.reddituploads.com/9e722ae79fb64d27a8687088bc4a7e1c?fit=max&h=1536&w=1536&s=a308cc4d28dc56ec2f487180fbc57d25 image]) 
# modprobe ath6kl_usb
# echo "27d5 0001" > /sys/bus/usb/drivers/ath6kl_usb/new_id
